Muốn.

BỆNH VIỆN JOAQUÍN SOROLLA

Chết tiệt.
 ĐÌNH CÔNG!

CHIẾN ĐẤU VÌ SỨC KHỎE CỦA MÌNH!

The uh… the tying of her artery…

Hey.

I'm having such a shit day.

 What do you think?

No.
 Anyone with half a brain

would have let her die in the operating room.
 I don't wanna hear it!

Huh? I've been here for days.

So fuck you!

-It won't save mine. -You don't know that.

Tell me I'm just collateral damage

in the middle of my surgery.
 At least have the balls to tell me the truth.

pa: Was I collateral damage?

pa: No.

pa: That's all.

pa: You know what?

pa: You have a point there.

pa: Emilio!

I know.
 What?
 So she's stepping down?
vi:
tôi muốn từ chức.
 Gì cơ?
 Bà ấy từ chức à?

en: - Nada más lejos de la realidad. - ¿Cómo?

vi:
Không đời nào.
 Hoàn toàn sai sự thật.
 Gì cơ?

pa: Because I…

I didn't take this role
 just on a whim.
 I took it because things need to change.
vi:
Tôi không nhận chức vụ này cho vui.
 Tôi nhận chức vụ này vì muốn tạo sự khác biệt.

pa:
And
 I won't be leaving,

en: hasta que esta situación se arregle.

What the fuck is she doing?

pa: Sorry. Excuse me.

Cảm ơn.

pa:
that's spreading through my organs.
 If these unions want to achieve anything,

I'll make them better.
 Thank you very much.
